text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX The same partisans who brought you the Russia Hoax and a bogus impeachment, will do everything in their power to sabotage your war on Covid19, and subvert all attempts of reviving the economy. It’s Trump Derangement in its most perverse form. Power before country.
